name: Newstree
tag_list: news-search, daily-news, current-events, breaking-news, semantic-web, taxonomy, clusters, journalism, hyperlinking, media, linking, contextual-content
overview:
Newstree is a free intelligent news and information portal bringing you effective user defined tailored searches on the very latest news from all around the world from media archives to personal posts. Harnessing local and world renowned global agencies and sources we give you unprecedented views, comparisons and perspectives.

Newstree gives unparalleled features from user-generated content to aggregated news across multi-language news sources worldwide. The interface is developed for optimal presentation of the information in a variety of displays for easy cross analysis and interaction.

Newstree uniqueness is in the variety of simultaneously used criteria for searching and displaying news. The synchronization of the criteria allows specifying the search request and receiving the very news you are interested in.
